org.youscope.common.microscope

Interface ChannelManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface ChannelManager
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Allows access to the current microscope channel settings.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

        java.lang.String[] getChannelGroupIDs()
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        java.rmi.RemoteException

               throws SettingException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns all channels in the given channel group.
        Parameters:
        channelGroupID - The ID of channel group for which the IDs of the contained channels should be returned..
        Returns:

      • getChannel

        Channel getChannel(java.lang.String channelGroupID,
                   java.lang.String channelID)
            throws SettingException,
                   java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the channel with the given ID and channel group ID. Returns null if either the channel group or the channel id is null.
        Parameters:
        channelGroupID - The channel group where the channel is defined.
        channelID - The ID of the channel.
        Returns:
        The channel.
        Throws:
        SettingException - Thrown if the channel is not defined.
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addChannel

        Channel addChannel(java.lang.String channelGroupID,
                   java.lang.String channelID)
            throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                   SettingException,
                   java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds the channel in the given config group. If the channel and/or the config group do not exist, they are created. If the channel does already exist, it is returned.
        Parameters:
        channelGroupID - The config group where the channel should be created.
        channelID - The name of the channel.
        Returns:
        The newly added channel.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeLockedException
        SettingException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • removeChannel

        void removeChannel(java.lang.String channelGroupID,
                   java.lang.String channelID)
            throws MicroscopeLockedException,
                   SettingException,
                   java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes the channel in the given channel group. If either the channel or the channel group do not exist, a setting exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        channelGroupID - The group in which the channel is defined.
        channelID - The ID of the channel.
        Throws:
        MicroscopeLockedException
        SettingException
        java.rmi.RemoteException
